  • Method Details

    • getCardFromCardName

      public Card getCardFromCardName(String cardName)
      Get a card from its card name.
      Parameters:
      cardName - name of a card.
      Returns:
      returns null or the first found valid card.

    • getCardCountFromCardName

      public int getCardCountFromCardName(String cardName)
      Gets the amount of the same card in the deck.
      Parameters:
      cardName - the name of the card to get the count of.
      Returns:
      the amount of cards with the name of the input.

    • getCardsWithFrequency

      public ArrayList<Card> getCardsWithFrequency(int min_frequency, int max_frequency)
      Gets a list of cards that has a specific frequency.
      Parameters:
      min_frequency - minimum occurrence
      max_frequency - maximum occurrence
      Returns:
      A list of card objects.

    • hasCardWithCardName

      public boolean hasCardWithCardName(String cardName)
      Checks if the given card name exists in the deck.
      Parameters:
      cardName - name of card to check for.
      Returns:
      true/false if it exists or not.

    • sortDeck

      public void sortDeck()
      Method to sorting an object arraylist by name. Source: https://www.codebyamir.com/blog/sort-list-of-objects-by-field-java

    • addDeck

      public void addDeck(Deck _deck)
      Adds all cards in one deck to another deck.
      Parameters:
      _deck - is a Deck to be added into the deck.

    • drawCardAtIndex

      public Card drawCardAtIndex(int index)
      Draws the card at a specific index. (Drawing a card will remove it from deck)
      Parameters:
      index - specific index of where to draw the card from
      Returns:
      the drawn card

    • addCardAtIndex

      public void addCardAtIndex(Card card, int index)
      Adds a specific card object at a specific index.
      Parameters:
      card - object of a card instance.
      index - specific index to insert the card at. If too small or too big, it gets inserted to the top of the deck.
